com.asprise.util.tiff - package com.asprise.util.tiff
 
countPages() - Method in class com.asprise.util.tiff.TIFFReader
Returns the total number pages in the TIFF file.
createTIFFFromImages(BufferedImage[], File) - Static method in class com.asprise.util.tiff.TIFFWriter
Creates a TIFF file from the specified images. all the images are converted to black-white and GROUP4 compression is used for the TIFF.

Converts an image into a buffered image.
getPage(int) - Method in class com.asprise.util.tiff.TIFFReader
Returns an image that contains the decoded contents of the specified page of the TIFF. 0 refer to the first page, 1 to the second, and so on.
